item.title: The center of Germany
item.description: The Problem A few days ago a friend told me that multiple cities claim to be the “center” of Germany. I was very confused, because for me the projection of the average point to germany was the obvious choice. My idea was, that such a “center” would minimize the integral over Germany of the distance between the center and points \(p\) of Germany. I was wrong. Even though I was wrong, I still think the problem was fun to think about.
